### Procurement Details

*   Tender Type: Request for Proposal
*   Procurement Method: Public
*   Aptitude Requirements: No
*   Language Requirements: English and French

### Supplier Eligibility

This tender is open to:
- TSPS Category 1 Supply Arrangement holders
- In the National Capital Region
- Under the following categories:
  - STREAM 2: BUSINESS CONSULTANT/CHANGE MANAGEMENT SERVICES
  - Resource Category: Level 2.3 (Business Consultant - 3)
  - Resource Category: Level 2.3 (Business Consultant - 2)
